Search for Kevin

Found these Representatives and Senators whose names sound like 'Kevin':

Name Electorate / State Party
Kevin Rudd Griffith Australian Labor Party

Also try browsing the list of all Representatives, all Senators or all divisions.

Enter your postcode, MP name, electorate or debate topic:

Example: "2042", "Tony Abbott", "Bennelong" or "Medicare"

MPs: You can enter a postcode to get a list of all MPs for that electorate, or else enter their name or part of their name. If you don't know exactly how to spell the name, write it as best you can like it sounds.

Divisions: To find divisions you are interested in, enter the name of a subject, such as "Pensions" or "Hunting". The Public Whip will search the titles of the divisions and the text of the motion being debated. If you enter multiple words, it will only find entries where they appear next to each other as you enter them. You can enter part of a word.

About the Project

The Public Whip is brought to you by the not-for-profit OpenAustralia Foundation. It is based on the UK site of the same name.

If you'd like to talk to us about the project, please email us.

The Whip on the Web

  • Twitter
Other projects by us that you might find interesting:
OpenAustralia, Election Leaflets, Right To Know and Planning Alerts.
The Public Whip is a not-for-profit, open source, project. Get the source code.
